wikipedia_page.main: Owen Roughwood (9 June 1876, in London – 30 May 1947, in Kent) was a British stage and film actor. He married actress Hilda Anthony in 1913.

* Owen Roughwood as Comte de Verneuil
The Queen Mother is a 1916 British silent adventure film directed by Wilfred Noy and starring Owen Roughwood, Gladys Mason and Barbara Rutland.Low p.94
* Owen Roughwood as Gil de Berault

Hilda Anthony married fellow actor Owen Roughwood, in 1913.Who's who in the Theatre (Pittman 1922): 699-700. She was widowed when he died in 1947. Hilda Anthony died in Hampstead, London in 1962, aged 75 years."Hilda Anthony" Stage Beauty.net.
